name: Bonnington Jumeirah Lakes Towers

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Not on the Beach front for sure but an amazing luxurious hotel close to the tube and at 10 minutes in taxi from anywhere. The service was excellent and the pool overlooking the city was breathtaking by night for a romantic swing!
reviews.title: Just Amazing

reviews.text: Hotel is ultra clean and service top quality. Food is outstanding at all dining in and room service. Highly recommend! Stayed for business and would stay here again. recommned suite room for minimal extra cost is worth the price
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text: the hotel located in a very nice aria . there are lakes all around the hotel and the staff was very nice , also the rooms are very clean and big enough , i recommend this hotel to family and business travel
reviews.title: nice hotel
A really nice place to stay
reviews.text: Although the Bonnington is not in the centre of Dubai it is close to a Metro Station - the Metro is very cheap - and also within easy walking distance of Dubai Marina, with the excellent beach not far beyond that. The hotel itself offers every amenity and first class accommodation. An Irish Pub alongside provides standard 'British' fare at reasonable prices. There is a small but well stocked supermarket next door for any essentials. For a 'stop-over' it is a great choice - my wife and I enjoyed our stay immensely.

If you need a hotel in JLT, this is a descent option. Your typical 5 star business hotel with ditto rooms and service. There is a couple of happening bars downstairs worthwhile a drink or a bite of pub grub.
reviews.title: Typical business hotel.

reviews.text: In the heart of JLT, just behind the prestigious Almas Tower, 5 mnts walking to JLT Metro Station. Lobby is so classic with wooden and leather decorations all around the place, while rooms are so contemporary design and modern furniture at every single detail. Leisure area at 11th floor, with amazing infinity pool, gym, spa, etc.
reviews.title: Contemporary and Classic at the same time!

reviews.text: Nightspot Mcgettigan's is fabulous, Healy's and Cavendish are just amazing!
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for 5 nights in March and found the staff to be very pleasant and helpful. They missed cleaning my room one day but sorted that out quickly after I called housekeeping.
reviews.title: Nice!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 5 minutes walk from Lake Towers Metro station and another 15 to the JBR Walk so ample opportunities to move about if one wishes to do so.
reviews.title: Fantastic place and outstanding service !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Standard of the room was high, fitness area and sauna were good and the breakfast is served early in the morning with a large buffet and made-to-order omelettes and waffles.
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Not a bad Hotel when you are so spoint for Choice in Dubai.... The pool was an attraction of its own. Usual Drinks/alcohol charges make any hotel stay in dubai a very expensive affair... I think my bill for a 4 day stay (minibar) was £200 GBP! Any Hotel in Dubai which will offer a "free" minibar will get my booking instantly upto £100 per night pe room and even without a breakfast....
reviews.title: Good hotel, spectacular Pool, the usual high charges for the Alcohol...
Good hotel but to far from the action
reviews.text: I would recommend this hotel for Couples.
I would also point out the outstanding quality of bathrooms in this hotel, which is probably the biggest bathroom i have seen i any hotel...
reviews.title: Localized Jumeirah Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is not Super, however, there is always the local overground trains and the taxis which are dirt cheap.... Will I come back to this hotel? Maybe....
reviews.title: Lots of pros, some cons

reviews.text: On arrival I was offered a refreshing drink whilst I waited to be served which was a nice touch to stay my birthday weekend celebrations. The high standard of customer service continued throughout the stay (2 nights) with reception sending extra Molton Brown shower gels speedily when I had run out and the concierge offering good advice on places to see in Dubai. The neighbouring bar (McGettigan's) is a locals favourite with good selections of beverages, value for money food and fun entertainment at the weekends. However, if your room is overlooking this bar it will be noisy until 11pm. We stayed on the opposite and it was very peaceful. I enjoyed the stay but for the price I would consider a hotel closer to downtown areas.
reviews.title: Nice location and Quite Hotel

reviews.text: Just returned from a stay here. Enjoyed the hotel. The pool looked lovely but seems to not get the sun for very long which was disappointing, so we went to the beach which wasn't far away. Our 1 bedroom apartment was very nice, well equipped, well set out. Service was good. Lovely meal in mcgettigans which was reasonably priced and very tasty. Sometimes a bit of a delay getting taxi's in early evening, but on leaving for our flight at 4am, there was one waiting on us. Supermarket within a few meters of hotel. Metro a 10 minute walk. We actually walked back from the beach which was about 20-30 minutes. Taxis are pretty cheap if you choose Dubai Taxi. Overall a positive experience.
reviews.title: Enjoyable stay
Awesome
reviews.text: Stayed here for close on 2 weeks in a 2 bedroom apartment and later A 3 bedroom apartment. There was a mixup regarding our reservation as they could not find the booking, but this was resolved in an extremely polite and efficient manner. The staff were excellent from the Front desk to the Concierge to the Cleaning staff. All were polite, friendly and always eager to please. The apartments are extremely comfortable and spacious and a 2 bedroom is perfect for a family of 4-6, whilst the 3 bedroom can accommodate between 6-8 very comfortably. The bedrooms are of a good size and the beds extremely comfortable, but my only gripe is regarding the Master Bathroom which I feel should have had a separate shower cubicle. The views from the 34th floor are awesome. The area is perfect as the metro is a few minutes from the Hotel while a walk to The beach is a mere 20 minutes away, (time saving as it takes ages for the taxi to get there with all the traffic,especially at nights). There is a Mini Supermarket across from the main entrance which really makes life very easy, especially if you do not take breakfast at the hotel which is quite expensive. All in All we had a great stay and I will definitely stay at this hotel again.
We spent a night in Dubai on our way to India and my agent recommended this property.
reviews.title: Decent price, good stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It has everything you would expect - restaurants, bars, spa etc.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.text: It is well managed, clean, with helpful staff - I specially liked the cafe in the courtyard, it seems popular with ex pats enjoying their lagers.
reviews.title: Bad experience at Bonnington JLT

description: The Bonnington Jumeirah Lakes Towers – Dubai, located in the heart of Jumeirah Lakes Towers along Sheikh Zayed Road just opposite Dubai Marina, is a 5-star hotel with 208, all non-smoking, rooms and suites, 272 luxurious serviced hotel apartments, 5 restaurants and bars, 4 conference suites, a Leisure Deck on the 11th floor with infinity pool, state of the art gym, pool bar, Jacuzzi, steam, sauna as well as a ladies' hairdressing salon.
